DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety efficacy two regimen etanercept patient rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) . The two regimen compare 25mg twice weekly regimen 50mg weekly regimen .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating 10 mg 25 mg Doses Etanercept Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare safety efficacy two regimen etanercept patient rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) . The two regimen compare 25mg twice weekly regimen 50mg weekly regimen .
DOC.criteria: Presence > 6 swollen joint > 6 tender joint Inadequate response least one disease modify antirheumatic drug ( DMARD ) Have treat DMARD least 4 week prior baseline visit Previous treatment etanercept , antibody TNFα , TNFα inhibitor Received investigational drug within 6 month baseline visit Received intraarticular hyaluronic acid injection within 4 week baseline visit
